entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023
